title: Logo of a German TV Show
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for the Font that is used in the logo of the German TV show called "Türkisch für Anfänger". Would be awesome if someone could identify it or name similar fonts. I'm planing to do some fanart with it.

Thanks a lot!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123145im_/http:/typophile.com/files/pic_1370266145_1_4670.jpg)

Font: 

 Marker Felt 

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Türkisch\_für\_Anfänger.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123145/http:/typophile.com/files/T%C3%BCrkisch_f%C3%BCr_Anf%C3%A4nger.jpg) | 398.54 KB |
author: j0lt

comments.content:
Found it out myself

The font is called Marker Felt

[http://www.ffonts.net/Marker-Felt.font.download](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023123145/http:/www.ffonts.net/Marker-Felt.font.download "http://www.ffonts.net/Marker-Felt.font.download")
